methods.javadoc:
Returns the name of this repository.
@throws IOException if an IO error occurs
methods.name: getName
methods.comment: Returns the name of this repository.

methods.javadoc:
Returns user object associated with this handle.
@throws IOException if an IO error occurs
methods.name: getUser
methods.comment: Returns user object associated with this handle.

methods.name: getUserList
methods.comment: Returns a list of users authorized for this repository.

methods.javadoc:
@return true if anonymous access allowed by this repository
@throws IOException if an IO error occurs
methods.name: anonymousAccessAllowed

return.comment: true if anonymous access allowed by this repository

methods.name: getServerUserList
methods.comment:
Convenience method for obtaining a list of all users
 known to the server.

methods.name: setUserList
methods.comment: Set the list of authorized users for this repository.

params.name: users
params.comment: list of user and access permissions.

params.name: anonymousAccessAllowed
params.comment:
true if anonymous access should be permitted to
 this repository

methods.name: getSubfolderList
methods.comment: Get list of subfolders contained within the specified parent folder.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.comment: Returns the number of folder items contained within this file-system.

methods.name: getItemList
methods.comment: Get of all items found within the specified parent folder path.

return.comment: list of items contained within specified parent folder

methods.name: getItem
methods.comment: Returns the RepositoryItem in the given folder with the given name

return.comment: item or null if not found

methods.name: getItem
methods.comment: Returns the RepositoryItem with the given unique file ID

return.comment: item or null if not found

methods.name: createDatabase
methods.comment: Create a new empty database item within the repository.

throws.comment: if itemName or parentPath contains invalid characters

return.comment: initial buffer file open for writing

methods.name: openDatabase
methods.comment: Open an existing version of a database buffer file for non-update read-only use.

params.name: version
params.comment: existing version of data file (-1 = latest version)

params.name: minChangeDataVer
params.comment:
indicates the oldest change data buffer file to be
 included.  A -1 indicates only the last change data buffer file is applicable.

return.comment: remote buffer file for non-update read-only use

methods.name: openDatabase
methods.comment: Open the current version for checkin of new version.

return.comment: remote buffer file for updateable read-only use

methods.name: getVersions
methods.comment: Returns a list of all versions for the specified item.

methods.name: deleteItem
methods.comment: Delete the specified version of an item.

params.name: version
params.comment:
oldest or latest version of item to be deleted, or -1
 to delete the entire item.  User must be Admin or owner of version to be
 deleted.

methods.name: moveFolder
methods.comment: Move an entire folder

methods.name: moveItem
methods.comment: Move an item to another folder

methods.name: checkout
methods.comment: Perform a checkout on the specified item.

methods.name: terminateCheckout
methods.comment: Terminate an existing item checkout.

params.name: notify
params.comment: notify listeners of item status change

methods.name: getCheckout
methods.comment: Returns specific checkout data for an item.

methods.name: getCheckouts
methods.comment: Get a list of all checkouts for an item.

methods.name: folderExists
methods.comment: Returns true if the specified folder path exists.

methods.name: fileExists
methods.comment: Returns true if the specified item exists.

methods.name: getLength
methods.comment:
Returns the length of this domain file.  This size is the minimum disk space
 used for storing this file, but does not account for additional storage space
 used to tracks changes, etc.

methods.name: hasCheckouts
methods.comment: Returns true if the specified item has one or more checkouts.

methods.name: isCheckinActive
methods.comment: Returns true if the specified item has an active checkin.

methods.name: updateCheckoutVersion
methods.comment: Update checkout data for an item following an update of a local checkout file.

methods.name: getEvents
methods.comment: Get pending change events.  Call will block until an event is available.

methods.javadoc:
Notification to server that client is dropping handle.
@throws IOException if error occurs
methods.name: close
methods.comment: Notification to server that client is dropping handle.

name: RepositoryHandle
comment: RepositoryHandle provides access to a repository.
